message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000.
I understand you're looking for a competitive price, Bob.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a very fair offer considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
